From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

Ignatius, or the bot in the body of the bot looked at the talons on the
hands of the body that he was currently inhabiting. "OK, I'll try and
explain the pieces of the puzzle that I understand." He stopped momentarily
to try to piece it together for himself, "Prebon loaded my backup program
into the Trainers base computer in case anybody took control of the base I
would act as a security system and feed false information." he paused again
trying to sort out the facts. "Ignatius became out of control so I activated
myself and turned the security field on him." useing both memories made it
slightly easier to sort out what was what but it also made his thoughts more
jumbled. "I remember a power surge hitting Ignatius dureing the fight, the
arc must have carried me across to him then." Even he knew that the story
sounded unbelievable, "Ignatius paniced and attacked impossible odds so when
his spark was to weak to continue I took over." There was one final detail
he was neglecting, "OH, I must apoligize, My names Lightraid, function
design and construction specialist. I was with Prebon when we left Predacon
juristiction but unfortunately I became the first casualty. Judging by
Ignatius' memory and the last recorded records I guess things aren't going
well for us."

Meanwhile not very far away Prebon watches infrared scans of the two
Trainers. Something seemed familiar about them. The Eagle had been in his
dream but the other one was unknown. "I knew him once, or at least a unit
like him." he tried to focus but his memories betrayed him.  Scanning the
box he found something even more peculiar. His own signature resinated from
the bots recognition program. Thinking back as far as he could remember
something clicked. A message flashed through his mind, his body locked in
place, "Prebon, I'm sure you know me. If this message is being played your
circuitry has either been damaged or altered. A backup program can be
initiated simple by saying my name. If you haven't figured it out yet, I AM
PREBON"

The trainer units functions became unlocked as he realized what the Preds
had done to him. "They will pay for what they've done, so swears PREBON" As
his name is spoken the backup memory was activated reloading everything that
had happened to him up to the point he'd been overpowered at the Black
fortress. Now revitalized he had a score to settle.

Activateing his jetpack he flew toward the box. "Stand down Trainers, your
commander has spoken."

From: <Yanshosh@...>

box.

"It

loading

he
> > pressed a code opening the box, "There's backup disks for everybody that
> > landed with Prebon in case anything happened to the team." his eyes lit
as
> > the name Light raid came across. "My informations included, I was meant
to
> > be recreated after my memory was transfered out of the base computer." I
can
> > live again."
